thread.title: Hilton Worldwide announces plans for Nairobi hotel
thread.title_full: Hilton Worldwide announces plans for Nairobi hotel

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Hilton Worldwide announces plans for Nairobi hotel
text:
Hilton Worldwide announces plans for Nairobi hotel   
Aug 26, 2015   
NAIROBI, Kenya - Hilton Worldwide has announced its plans to open a new Nairobi hotel, its first in the country. With an expected opening early 2016, Hilton Garden Inn Jomo Kenyatta International Airport will have 171 guest rooms and suites, and will be just over one mile from JKIA. 
Aside from travel convenience for local, regional and international visitors, the hotel will offer more than 300 square meters of events space, a business center, fitness center, outdoor swimming pool and its brand signature 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.
